title: Robert Greenhill - Summit on Canada’s Global Leadership

quotes:
My Sessions
November 28, 2019
10:30 am - 12:00 pm
The Case for Caring: Why Should Canada Invest in a Better World?

November 28, 2019
4:00 pm - 5:00 pm
Closing Plenary Day 2: Tying It All Together: What Should Canada’s Foreign Policy Agenda Be?

November 27, 2019
10:00 am - 11:00 am
Opening Plenary Day 1: Setting the tone: What should Canada’s foreign policy agenda be?
